title: How many players in League?
body:
This is a question I´ve had for a long time now. **Is league still as popular as it used to be?** I just want to know if it is still the most played video game in the world.


                                                                                                                                                     Thanks in advance, my fellow salt lords <3

replies.body: 2014 article but i wouldnt be surprised if its still around the same if not more numbers

Thank you, sir! I´ve tried looking it up as well, but all i can find is 2014-2015 info. Was curious if it was still mega popular.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

According to an interview with Riot Tryn and Riot Ryze a few weeks back, the average monthly unique player count is 100,000,000. (100 million). IT does include smurfs though, but even if every player on the server had 1 smurf on played on them during the month it would be 50 million and still be the most popular.

So yes League of Legends is still the most popular game in the world.

Really I have no idea or visibility on something like that!  I couldn't begin to make a guess.  You should hit up our [Miscellaneous ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)boards to see if the community can help!  

http://images.boomsbeat.com/data/images/full/179580/guessing-iphone-6-price-jpg.jpg
